A business establishment owner can: 
• Add their restroom location(s). 
• Add a photo gallery of the restroom. 
• Enable/Disable the availability status of the restroom. 
• Rate a restroom. 
• Give a comment/review about a restroom. 
• Report a restroom location.

A regular user can: 
• Rate a restroom. 
• Give a comment/review about a restroom. 
• Report a restroom location.

How to locate a restroom 
 
1. Enable your device’s “Location” services by turning it on in the Settings > Connections > Locations, or drag down your device’s status bar and tap “Location” service. 
 
2. Open the application’s navigation drawer (≡). 
 
3. Tap the “View Maps”. 
 
4. The nearby restroom locations will appear. Tap a restroom location to view a restroom. 
 
5. A dialog box will appear displaying the restroom’s photo gallery, ratings, and comments about the restroom. This will help you decide if you want to use that particular restroom or not. 
 
6. Tap the “Get Direction” button. 
 
7. Follow the route guide to the restroom location.

How to rate and review a restroom 
 
1. Open the application’s navigation drawer (≡). 
 
2. Tap the “View Maps”. 
 
3. Tap a restroom location to view a restroom. 
 
4. A dialog box will appear. Tap the “Rate and Review” button. 
 
5. Tap a star (★) to rate the restroom. 
 
6. Tap on the “Write a review” field to review the restroom. 
 
7. Tap the “Submit” button. 
 
Note: Only registered users have the privileges to rate and review a restroom.

1. Open the application’s navigation drawer (≡). 
 
2. Tap the “View Maps”. 
 
3. The locations of nearby restroom will appear. Tap a restroom location to view the specific details of a particular restroom. 
 
4. A dialog box will appear. Tap the report button (!) on the upper right corner of the dialog box. 
 
5. Another dialog box will appear. Tap the dropdown and select the reason why you want to report the restroom. 
 
6. Tap the “Submit Report” button. 
 
Note: Only registered users have the privileges to report a restroom.

1. Open the application’s navigation drawer (≡). 
 
2. Tap the “View Maps”. 
 
3. Tap the add restroom button located on the lower right corner of the screen. 
 
4. A prompt will appear at the bottom of the screen. Tap “Add”. 
 
5. The instructions on how to add a restroom will appear. Tap “OK” button. 
 
6. A restroom marker will appear on the map. Hold the restroom marker and drop it on your business location. 
 
7. Tap on the restroom marker to specify the restroom details. 
 
8. A dialog box will appear. Tap the “Floor Level” dropdown and select the floor level of the restroom location. 
 
9. Tap the “Add Image” to add a photo gallery of the restroom. A prompt may appear asking you to allow the application to access your media files. Tap “Allow”. 
 
10. Select the photo(s) of the restroom from your device’s media files. You can only add a maximum of 5 photos for that particular restroom location. 
 
11. Tap the “Add Restroom” button. 
 
Note: Only registered business owners have the privileges to add a restroom location.

1. Open the application’s navigation drawer (≡). 
 
2. Tap the “View Maps”. 
 
3. Tap the restroom location which you want to disable/enable. 
 
4. Toggle “Yes” to enable, or “No” to disable the restroom location. When toggling “No”, a dialog box will appear informing you the results of disabling a restroom. 
 
5. Tap the “Yes” button to confirm disabling the restroom. The background color of the selected restroom location will change representing that it is disabled. 
 
Note: Only registered business owners have the privileges to enable/disable a restroom location.

1. Open the application’s navigation drawer (≡). 
 
2. Tap the “View Maps”. 
 
3. Tap the restroom location which you want to delete. 
 
4. Tap the “Delete Restroom” button located the bottom of the dialog box. Another dialog box will appear informing you the results of deleting a restroom. 
 
5. Tap the “Yes” button to confirm deleting the restroom. 
 
Note: Only registered business owners have the privileges to delete a restroom location.

1. Open the application’s navigation drawer (≡). 
 
2. Tap the “Settings”. 
 
3. Select the “Account Settings”. 
 
4. Tap the “Current Password” field. 
 
5. Enter the password you have used to log in your account. 
 
6. Tap the “New Password” field. 
 
7. Enter the new password for your account. 
 
8. Tap the “Confirm Password” field. 
 
9. Confirm the new password for your account. 
 
10. Tap the “Save Changes” button. 
 
9. A dialog box will appear informing you that you have successfully changed the password of your account. Tap the “Ok” button. 
 
Note: Only registered users have the privileges to change their account password.

1. Open the application’s navigation drawer (≡). 
 
2. Tap the “Settings”. 
 
3. Select the “Business Establishment Settings”. 
 
4. Tap the “Current Password” field. 
 
5. Enter the password you have used to log in your account. 
 
6. Tap the “New Business Name” field. 
 
7. Enter the new name for your business establishment. 
 
8. Tap the “Save Changes” button. 
 
9. A dialog box will appear informing you that you have successfully changed the name of your business. Tap the “Ok” button. 
 
Note: Only registered business owners have the privileges to change the business establishment name.

1. Open the application’s navigation drawer (≡). 
 
2. Tap the “Settings”. 
 
3. Select the “Account Settings”. 
 
4. Tap the “Delete Account” button located at the bottom of the screen. 
 
5. A dialog box will appear informing you the results of deleting your account. 
 
6. Tap the “Enter Your Password” field. 
 
7. Enter the password you have used to log in your account. 
 
8. Tap the “Confirm” button to confirm deleting your account. 
 
Note: Only registered business owners have the privileges to change the business establishment name.

1. Tap the “Sign Up” button located at the log in screen. 
 
2. Select on which type of user you are signing up for. Tap the more info (?) to see the privileges of each user type. 
 
	 Business Establishment Owner: 
		 • Add their restroom location(s). 
		 • Add a photo gallery of the restroom. 
		 • Enable/Disable the availability of the restroom. 
		 • Rate a restroom. 
		 • Give a comment/review about a restroom. 
		 • Report a restroom location. 
 
	 Regular User: 
		 • Rate a restroom. 
		 • Give a comment/review about a restroom. 
		 • Report a restroom location. 
 
3. Tap the “Next” button. 
 
4. If you are signing up for a business establishment owner type, tap the “Business Establishment Name” field. 
 
5. Enter the name of your business establishment. 
 
6. Tap the “Email Address” field. 
 
7. Enter a valid email address. The address you will enter will be the recipient of the verification email. 
 
8. Tap the “Password” field. 
 
9. Enter your account password. 
 
10. Tap the “Confirm Password” field. 
 
11. Confirm your account password. 
 
12. Tap the “Done” button. 
 
13. A dialog box will appear informing you to verify the email address you have entered. Tap the “Ok” button. 
 
14. Check your email address and follow the steps to verify your account. 
 
Note: You cannot log in your account unless it is verified first.
Restroom availability:

Confirm Restroom Availability 
 
Are you sure you want to disable this restroom? 
 
The following of features of this restroom will be disabled: 
 
• Get Directions 
• Rate and Review 
• Report Restroom
Current password is wrong.

How to add a restroom: 
 
1. A restroom marker will appear at the center of your screen 
 
2. Move the restroom marker to your business establishment location. 
 
3. Tap the marker and put the floor level. 
 
4. Then select up to 5 images to upload for your restroom. 
 
5. Tap "Add Restroom".
How to?
This restroom is currently disabled. You cannot rate and review or get directions to this restroom.

Wash is a mobile Android application that will aid potential user(s) to be able to easily locate restroom locations nearby or within a particular area. Essentially, with the use of Global Positioning System (GPS) to enable Google Maps with high accuracy locating method. Moreover, Internet connection, such as Wi-Fi and mobile data, are also significant to retrieve real-time and reliable information about the restroom locations. As the application also guides the user(s) towards a particular restroom location by depicting the shortest possible route, making it most convenient to reach their desired restroom location. Specific details regarding the restroom locations, such as floor level and business establishment name (e.g. malls, fast food dining, gasoline stations, etc.) are also provided by Wash to eliminate ambiguity for the user(s). 
 
 	Wash also conveys sophisticated features such as displaying a photo gallery, ratings, and reviews of the former user(s) of the restroom. Whereas, the photo gallery will aid them to see the restroom’s physical appearance. Also, the rating and review of the former individual user shows their perspective and point of view about a restroom location. These two features will assist the potential user(s) with their decision-making dilemma on whether to go to that particular restroom location or choose another one. Additionally, the application also shows availability status of the restroom. If in case the restroom is unavailable, user(s) cannot utilize the route guide feature mentioned above. 
 
 	Furthermore, Wash also uses the rating and reviews as a feedback from the user(s) and customer(s) of the restrooms located within a business establishment. Where owners of the business can view these feedback and encourage them to improve their restroom quality. Likewise, the application will also promote the cleanliness, orderliness, and improve the quality of the restrooms of the business establishments.
Developed by
